rows.label: tev000494_MSG0001
rows.name: [ST:playername ]? What are you doing here?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0002
rows.name:
Damn it all! I can't believe you've discovered my secret
training regimen![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0003
rows.name: I worked so hard to conceal it from my rivals...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0004
rows.name:
But I suppose there's nothing to be done about it now.
So go ahead! Make it your own! Steal all of my ideas!
I will find a new and better way to stay ahead of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0005
rows.name:
Er, but while we're on the subject, what do you
consider to be the secret to success?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_JNK0010
rows.name: Luck

rows.label: tev000494_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that luck is the key factor.

rows.label: tev000494_JNK0020
rows.name: Ability

rows.label: tev000494_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that one's ability is the key factor.

rows.label: tev000494_JNK0030
rows.name: Spirit

rows.label: tev000494_SEL0031
rows.name: Say that an indomitable spirit is the key factor.

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0006
rows.name: Luck, you say? I see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0007
rows.name: Well, I cannot deny the value of such a thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0008
rows.name:
Certainly, some of those in high places achieved their
positions through the capricious whims of Lady Fortune,
despite a clear lack of ability.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0009
rows.name: Er, I am not speaking of you, of course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0010
rows.name:
But I fear I must disagree, for I do not consider luck to
be the key factor in success.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0011
rows.name:
It is ability, above all else, that determines success.
One must always prioritize increasing their abilities,
even if the effort is great and the result small.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0012
rows.name: For once, you and I are of the same mind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0013
rows.name: Luck may bring victory, but only a fleeting one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0014
rows.name:
Ability, at sufficient levels, brings not only the possibility
of success, but the near certainty of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0015
rows.name:
Success comes unbidden to the skilled; it is acquiring
and increasing those skills that poses the challenge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0016
rows.name: How charmingly naïve.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0017
rows.name: Oh, certainly, such spirit can be a virtue.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0018
rows.name:
But do you truly consider mindlessly throwing yourself
at the same insurmountable challenge over and over
again to be a true path to success?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0019
rows.name:
Let us be realistic, you and I—honing one's skills is the
way to increase the odds of success, not some kind of
intangible...pluck, or grit, or what have you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0020
rows.name: And that is why I developed my training regimen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0021
rows.name:
I do not see NLA as a place for rest and relaxation,
but rather as a forge upon which to temper my skills.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0022
rows.name:
After all, it seems that my rival is honing [ST:gender p1=his p2=her ] own skills
at an alarming rate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0023
rows.name: Therefore, I must work all the harder to compensate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0024
rows.name:
And now that I have spilled forth my secret, tell me—
what is yours?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_JNK0040
rows.name: Be Evasive

rows.label: tev000494_SEL0041
rows.name: Say that stuff just...happens. It's nothing special.

rows.label: tev000494_JNK0050
rows.name: Be Humble

rows.label: tev000494_SEL0051
rows.name: Say that the credit belongs to Elma.

rows.label: tev000494_JNK0060
rows.name: Be Honest

rows.label: tev000494_SEL0061
rows.name:
Claim that your success comes from
finishing a great number of missions.

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0025
rows.name: Hmph. Fine. Keep your secrets close.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0026
rows.name:
So it's to be scorched-earth warfare, then? You would
deny your rival even the dignity of an honest answer?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0027
rows.name:
Very well. I shall succeed through my own strength,
and never again turn to you for succor![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0028
rows.name: How very like you to say that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0029
rows.name:
It's true, you are certainly lucky to have a skilled
commander such as Elma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0030
rows.name: But she sees you as a trusted comrade as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0031
rows.name:
No reasonable person would waste effort propping up
a comrade who failed to pull [ST:gender p1=his p2=her ] own weight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0032
rows.name:
I cannot believe I'm saying this to my rival, but...
You are who you are because of your own strength
and ability. Not hers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0033
rows.name:
Although...perhaps your humility IS your secret?
Or a part of it, at least?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0034
rows.name:
I will study it, then, in hopes that it will lead me to
emulate your success. Farewell for now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0035
rows.name: I see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0036
rows.name:
By completing a wide variety of assignments, you've
gathered valuable experience.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0037
rows.name:
I certainly haven't forgotten how effortlessly you
completed the mission that I pushed onto you when
we first met.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0038
rows.name:
Perhaps I merely need more experience to bring out
the strength that lies within me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0039
rows.name: Your advice is appreciated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0040
rows.name:
It seems I have outgrown my special training regimen.
From now on, I will accept more missions in order to
keep pace with my rival.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0041
rows.name:
I will begin by engaging in 10 assignments
simultaneously, then work my way up from there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000494_MSG0042
rows.name: Farewell for now.[ST:wait ]
